title: Ray Romano
description:
On this episode Kevin sits down with comedian, actor, and sitcom legend Ray Romano. The two discuss how Ray got his big break from David Letterman, the success of his TV show ‘Everybody Loves Raymond’, why he prefers stand-up and performing over directing, and what he thinks his next step in comedy will be.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Ray Romano)
